[.....] and my testimony thereto (has been given) in Ḏuʾl-Qaʿda of the year two hundred and seventy two.
...... [is witness] to the same as regards his knowing him and his claim, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting.
....]h b. ..... [is witness] to the same as regards his knowing him and his claim, and he has written (it) in his (own) handwriting (handmark).
Witness is Ismaʿîl b. Idrîs b. Yaḥyâ, and he has written his testimony in his (own) handwriting.
